name: Until the last (itch) (Godchat)
description:
"Until the Last..." is a platform game raising awareness about the rapid melting of arctic icebergs.

The player, incarnated by a polar bear, must find their way to the north pole by avoiding crashing ice and a menacing cruise ship. Although the game lasts between 6 and 15 minutes, the level of difficulty progressively increases as the bear approaches the final safety point.

The creators evoke the intensity of the game through the ever looming presence of the cruise ship, a sountrack that builds on the suspense, and rapidly crashing icebergs that impede the bear's progress.

Control:

Move left: q or left/back arrow key

Move right: d or right/forward arrow key

Jump: z, up arrow key or spacebar
Bend: s or down arrow key
